reviewText:
I found it interesting, reminding of local highland games, a bit smaller here in Tasmania, Australia.  The new thing to me was the jousting, loved it.  As far as I know, we don't have that here.  DVD quality good,  my sister loved it.  Appreciated, love to see more DVDs of similiar games.  Don't see such locally, that I'm  where of- thats in Australia.  DVDs are to find here in Australia, particulaly here in Tasmania.  Hope you have the 2010 on DVD.  THANK YOU.

Kindest Regards

Peter J Barr
